title: Hell is the Stone Heart Unlocked and Unsatisfiable: Living Out the God Pattern Transforms the Heart.
description:
Paul revisits Karen to hammer out an understanding of his thoughts on Apex Existentially. We get down to definitions and then move to the big picture.
After the video and book links you'll find a list of terms discussed
Roger Scruton and Jordan Peterson on apprehending the Transcendent:  https://youtu.be/XvbtKAYdcZY
Karl Friston on Markov Blankets:  https://youtu.be/j53lfLyFOPA
Mark Solms on Consciousness: https://youtu.be/CmuYrnOVmfk
Karen's talk with Mark Solms: https://youtu.be/9DoK7JdvGhU
Dallas Willard on the Soul: https://youtu.be/a6dXYUoRYOw
Karen & Alex on Markov Blankets: https://youtu.be/0Ry0txtj4Fs
Books Karen recommends:
The Master & His Emissary by Iain McGilchrist
Hidden Spring: A Journey to the Source of Consciousness by Mark Solms
Book Paul recommends:  Max Sterner: The Ego and Its Own

What is the motivator of action? 
Apex Existentiality
Action
Power 
Self
Non-self
Biofeedback System
Perception
Heuristic
Observational
Memory
Habits of Belief
Vehicles of Power
